alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN DALE...SOUTHERN HENRY...EASTERN GENEVA...HOUSTON AND WESTERN EARLY COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EST/545 PM CST/... At 600 PM EST/500 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newton to near Graceville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Ozark, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Grimes, Avon, Newville, and Napier Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
